info.title: Promotion & Coupon Services
info.description: Test Macy's API using our easy to use Interactive Console! You can also view more detailed  written documentation. (Note: You must attain approval for an API key for one of the services in the drop-down menu below before being able to use the Macy's API Console.) Promotion & Coupon Services

externalDocs.description: Please contact us if you are having trouble getting access to keys: Click Here

get.summary: This service allows to retrieve promotions. Please...
get.description: This service allows to retrieve promotions. Please click here for the additional documentation.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML (Required) Ex. JSON

parameters.name: promoid
parameters.description: Promotional ID (Optional) Ex. 402902

parameters.name: global
parameters.description: Specifies if the promotion global or not (Optional) Ex. Y

parameters.name: sourcecode
parameters.description: sourcecode (Optional) Ex. D

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Promotion Type (Optional) Ex. Bundled GWP

parameters.name: promo_code
parameters.description: Promotion Code (Optional) Ex. 402903

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If sent, the format is JSONP (JSON with Padding) with the callback returned with the JSON response. You can put anything in the callback parameter and whatever you send is returned. (Optional) Ex. magicofmacysapi

get.summary: This service allows to retrieve promotions, coupon...
get.description: This service allows to retrieve promotions, coupons, or both using one call. Please click here for the additional documentation.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML (Required) Ex. JSON

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Specifies if you would like to return promotions, coupons, or promotions AND coupons (Required) Ex. promotions,coupons

parameters.name: promoid
parameters.description: Promotional ID (Optional) Ex. 402902

parameters.name: global
parameters.description: Specifies if the promotion global or not (Optional) Ex. Y

parameters.name: promotionsourcecode
parameters.description: Promotion Sourcecode (Optional) Ex. D

parameters.name: promotype
parameters.description: Promotion Type (Optional) Ex. Bundled GWP

parameters.name: promocode
parameters.description: Promotion Code (Optional) Ex. VETDAY

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel for Promotion or Coupon (Optional) Ex. MOBILE

parameters.name: coupontype
parameters.description: Coupon Type (Optional) Ex. Other

parameters.name: couponnumber
parameters.description: Coupon filter Number(Optional) Ex. 00030492100318133415

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If sent, the format is JSONP (JSON with Padding) with the callback returned with the JSON response. You can put anything in the callback parameter and whatever you send is returned. (Optional) Ex. magicofmacysapi

get.summary: The Promotions Sorted API call allows the users to...
get.description: The Promotions Sorted API call allows the users to get Deals and Promotion data set grouped and sorted by FOB to match data rendered on website. Please click here for the additional documentation.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML (Required) Ex. JSON

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Channel for the Promotion (Optional) Ex. SITE

post.summary: The Promotions Share API allows users to use a POS...
post.description: The Promotions Share API allows users to use a POST call to send automated emails to recipient(s) about MACY's Promotions or Coupons. Please click here for the additional documentation.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML (Required) Ex. JSON

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content type of the payload body as JSON or XML

get.description: This service allows to retrieve coupons. Please click here for the additional documentation.

parameters.name: accept
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML (Required) Ex. JSON

parameters.description: If sent, the format is JSONP (JSON with Padding) with the callback returned with the JSON response. You can put anything in the callback parameter and whatever you send is returned. (Optional) Ex. magicofmacysapi
